## Description {#details}

Define a generic scheduling policy for targets that don&#39;t provide their own <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineschedstrategy">MachineSchedStrategy</a>.

This can be overriden for each scheduling region before building the DAG.

Definition at line 192 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinescheduler-h">MachineScheduler.h</a>.
